USBCRCON.name: USBWKUPEN
USBCRCON.caption: USB Activity Detection Interrupt Enable bit

values.caption: Enable interrupt for detection of activity on USB bus in Sleep mode
Disable interrupt for detection of activity on USB bus in Sleep mode
Enable remote resume from suspend Interrupt
Disable interrupt to a Remote Devices USB resume signaling
Enables general interrupt from USB module
Disables general interrupt from USB module

USBCRCON.name: SENDMONEN
USBCRCON.caption: Session End Vbus Monitoring for OTG Enable bit

values.caption: Enable monitoring for Vbus in Session End range (between 0.2V and 0.8V)
Disable monitoring for Vbus in Session End range

USBCRCON.name: BSVALMONEN
USBCRCON.caption: B-Device Vbus Monitoring for OTG Enable bit

values.caption: Enable monitoring for Vbus in Session Valid range for B-device (between 0.8V and 4.0V)
Disable monitoring for Vbus in Session Valid range for B-device

USBCRCON.name: ASVALMONEN
USBCRCON.caption: A-Device Vbus Monitoring for OTG Enable bit

values.caption: Enable monitoring for Vbus in Session Valid range for A-device (between 0.8V and 2.0V)
Disable monitoring for Vbus in Session Valid range for A-device

USBCRCON.name: VBUSMONEN
USBCRCON.caption: Vbus Monitoring for OTG Enable bit

values.caption: Enable monitoring for Vbus in VBUS Valid range (between 4.4V and 4.75V)
Disable monitoring for Vbus in VBUS Valid range
Enable monitoring of the ID bit from the USB PHY
Disable monitoring of the ID bit from the USB PHY
ID override value is 1
ID override value is 0
Enable use of USBIDVAL bit
Disable use of USBIDVAL and instead use the PHY value
Connect
No activity detected on USB
Resume from Suspend state. Device wake-up activity can be started.
No Resume activity detected during Suspend
An event on the USB Bus has occurred
No interrupt from USB module or interrupts have not been enabled
